about.heading: About Me
about.description: I’m a developer figuring things out and writing code along the way.
about.text: Hey! I'm a self-taught full-stack developer with over a year of experience building real-world applications using modern web technologies. I love exploring how things work, diving into code architecture, and bringing ideas to life with clean, maintainable solutions. Whether it's a side project, open-source contribution, or a deep dive into a new framework — I'm always learning and building. When I’m not coding, you’ll find me somewhere under the stars or racing the wind on my bike.
